messages.title: DEMAND CLIMATE ACTION!
messages.content: The clearest and loudest way you can demand urgent action on the climate emergency is by voting Scottish Greens on December 12

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Greens have a real plan for a zero carbon country, aiming for a healthy, equitable and green society with secure jobs in sustainable industries.

issues.environment: A vote for the Greens is a vote for a healthy, equitable and green society with secure jobs in sustainable industries.

images.caption: Claire Miller, your Green candidate for Edinburgh East.
DEMAND CLIMATE ACTION! VOTE SCOTTISH GREENS
